thread.title: Gary Barlow has bagged a role in new Star Wars film but he won’t be a Storm Trooper
thread.title_full: Gary Barlow has bagged a role in new Star Wars film but he won’t be a Storm Trooper

author: jesswalfordmetro
title: Gary Barlow has bagged a role in new Star Wars film but he won’t be a Storm Trooper
text:
You won’t see him as a Storm Trooper (Picture: Redferns)Take That singer, songwriter extraordinaire, musical creator, is there nothing Gary Barlow can’t do? Now he can add moviestar to his list -after he confirmed he’s going to be in the upcoming Star Wars film.
Eddie Redmayne’s The Danish Girl blocked from airing in India The Shine singer told Lorraine’s Ross King: ‘I’m not a stormtrooper, but I am in it.’
Adding: ‘Now I’ve said that, I’ll probably be out. I think the Star Wars people are so strict about what information [is out there]. So me saying that, I’ve probably just done myself out of a role.’
But, you’re safe, Gary, after Lorraine staff checked the admission before airing it.

The rumours of a Barlow cameo have been running rife since last year , when he was believed to have been seen filming at Pinewood Studios in Buckinghamshire for a part in Star Wars: Episode VIII.
A source told The Sun: ‘Gary is a huge Star Wars fan so this is a dream come true.
The Take That front man spilled the beans on Lorraine (Picture: ITV) ‘The process has been kept top secret, as he doesn’t want anybody to find out.
‘His connections in the film industry got him the part.’
More: Film Here's why Evanna Lynch is just like her character Luna Lovegood from Harry Potter 
Russia gives Power Rangers its highest age rating over LGBT character 
Richard Gere doesn't think it was happy-ever-after for Pretty Woman's Vivian and Edward 
After stints in TV drama Heartbeat, Keith Lemon: The Film and Miranda, this won’t be Gary’s first on screen role. But it will be his biggest.
We look forward to seeing the front man in a galaxy far, far away very soon!
